attributes.action: Allow any body to join any pollitical party even if that party holds views the government disagrees with
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a civil servant I would be sacked if I joined the BNP. It has happened recently to others after the BNP membership list was made public. Wether or not I agree with all their policies is irrelevant. Surely, in a democracy we, the public, should have the right to join any legitimate party regardless of the fact that some of their ideas are disagreeable to some people.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
